title: LSTM Models for Time Series Analysis
description: Data retrieval, data processing, model selection, and model evaluation are all controlled via hyperparameters in a single config.py file. This architecture allows for instant comparison between Simple, Stacked, and Bidirectional Machine Learning models for time series analysis.

title: Graph Data Structure
description: Resilient C++ implementation of an undirected, unweighted graph data structure. Optimized for performance and memory efficiency, it supports essential graph algorithms including Breadth-First and Depth-First Search traversals.

title: Interactive Portfolio
description: This responsive personal website, built with React and Vite. It features a custom minimalist design system, real-time automation via GitHub Actions for gaming stats, and seamless integration with third-party APIs.

title: Time-based commit message prefixes
description: A tool to automatically add a time-based prefix to commit messages.

title: Coming Soon!
description: A tool to scrape metadata for retro games.
